The claim originated from a fake news we: which allows users to create their own fake news stories.
The Kentucky Department of Fish and Wild: stating that a nine-foot-long bull shark was not found in Kentucky Lake.
The image shared with the React365 post: depicting a shark fin, was not of a freshwater bull shark but of a great white shark. This image has been used on the internet for several years, including in actual news stories.
The presence of similar fake shark sight: such as Philpott Lake Virginia and the Mississippi River, indicates a pattern of users copying and reposting the same material with minor changes for social media shares.
